title: WALLABY workflow pipeline
description: Pipeline execution tool for the WALLABY science team. Will run the entire workflow including downloading of footprints from CASDA, running linmos and source finding.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Environment details for the execution of the WALLABY workflow in the AusSRC shared file system.

WORKDIR.description: Working directory in the shared file system to save all WALLABY workflow files

casda.title: CASDA
casda.description: CASDA credentials for downloading WALLABY footprints from the archive.

SBIDS.description: Scheduling block IDs of footprints to download from CASDA (comma separated string)

CASDA_CUBE_TYPE.description: Cube type parameter for CASDA file search

CASDA_CUBE_FILENAME.description: Filename query string for CASDA cube download

CASDA_WEIGHTS_TYPE.description: Weight type parameter for CASDA file search

CASDA_WEIGHTS_FILENAME.description: Weight query string for CASDA weight cube download

linmos.title: Linmos
linmos.description: Information required for the execution of the linear mosaicking application.

LINMOS_OUTPUT_IMAGE_CUBE.description: Filename of the output mosaicked image cube

LINMOS_CONFIG_FILENAME.description: Filename of the generated linmos configuration file

LINMOS_CLUSTER_OPTIONS.description: Cluster configuration for the execution of linmos.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Docker images to use for pipeline execution.

WALLABY_COMPONENTS_IMAGE.description: Docker image for component functions of the WALLABY workflow.

S2P_IMAGE.description: Docker image for generation of sofia parameter and sofiax config files using s2p_setup.py.

SOFIA_IMAGE.description: Docker image for the execution of sofia.

SOFIAX_IMAGE.description: Docker image for the execution of sofiax.
